titles.title: There Is Joy, Joy, Joy In The Presence Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is joy, joy, joy in the presence of the Lord.
Singing hallelujah, amen. AMEN!
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dance and celebrate,
Dance and celebrate.
Dance with joy before the Lord.
(Repeat.)
